mapper.insert: insert into personal_introduceman (PersonalUserid, PersonalreviewID, materialsname, materialsadjunct) values(#{PersonalUserid}, #{PersonalreviewID},#{materialsname},#{materialsadjunct});
insert into personal_others (PersonalUserid, PersonalreviewID, title, Projectscan) VALUES (#{PersonalUserid},#{PersonalreviewID},#{title},#{Projectscan});

insert into personal_research_materials (PersonalUserid, PersonalreviewID, starttime, stoptime, workunit, job, jobcontent, assistcertify) values (#{PersonalUserid},#{PersonalreviewID}, #{starttime},#{stoptime},#{workunit},#{job},#{jobcontent},#{assistcertify});

insert into personal_basic_message (PersonalUserid, PersonalreviewID, unit, unitlevel, personalidentitynature, reviewyear, name, nameformer, sex, nation, idnumber, birthday, fillingtime, startworktime, workingyears, reviewmeeting, wantprofessionseries, wantmajor, wantmajorstatus, executivefunction, executivefunctiontime, executivefunctionexplatin, phone, email, fileorganizationname, politicsstatus, nativeplace, address, idcardfront, idcardcontrary, manphoto) values (#{PersonalUserid},#{PersonalreviewID}, #{unit},#{unitlevel},#{personalidentitynature},#{reviewyear},#{name},#{nameformer},#{sex},#{nation},#{idnumber}, #{birthday},#{fillingtime},#{startworktime},#{workingyears},#{reviewmeeting},#{wantprofessionseries},#{wantmajor}, #{wantmajorstatus},#{executivefunction},#{executivefunctiontime},#{executivefunctionexplatin},#{phone},#{email}, #{fileorganizationname},#{politicsstatus},#{nativeplace},#{address},#{idcardfront},#{idcardcontrary},#{manphoto});
